name: Lloyd the Monkey 2 (January 2019 Demo)
description:
In Lloyd the Monkey 2, monkey swordfighter Lloyd finds himself teaming up with alien princess Lura to combat a returning evil.

The game is structured very similarly to Mega Man X, with hot-swappable playable characters that have different specialties both interacting with the game world at the same time.

The game has been in active development since June 2018, and its initial demo at the Sonic Amateur Games Expo that August had attracted the praise of Sonic Mania co-developer Simon "Stealth" Thomley. This demo incorporates feedback gathered during the expo and shows off three of the game's twelve planned action stages.

Staff:

Original Concept, Art, Program, Story: Noah Meyer

Music: Hunter Lobdell

Special Thanks: Simon "Stealth" Thomley (Headcannon), Ryan Bloom (TSSZ News)
